response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for both of us. This unique item is worth $1,500,000 to you, and I believe it's a perfect match for your needs and aspirations. After careful consideration, I propose to offer you this exceptional product at a price that reflects its true worth while ensuring a fair transaction for both parties. My offer is set at $1,200,000. I trust this proposal aligns with your expectations and financial planning. Should you have any questions or require further details, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1200000}
